if you must know, I've died off to....

hehehe.
I think I'm gona say goodbye to livejournal. Maybe it's time to go back to blogger or look for tumblr.

Nowadays all the girls in Singapore look the same. It's like they are photocopies of each other, everywhere! I doubt I'd be able to tell them apart. 


Huge-ass Long Fake Eyelashes. 
Coloured-Big-Eye-Rim Contacts
Super Long Hair - Some curled
Super Fair Skinned trying to act ang moh or be atas? I don't know which. 
Black-Black-Black more Black Outfits
Topshop Girls
Black Centre Parting Hair 

Not being bitchy but seriously? Everyone will just be plain walking dolls without character or charisma. First impressions I mean. Okay I won't say much about black hair or being a TopShop Girl 'cus most girls head there, TopShop is like fashion fiesta for girls our age, or even younger, or older. Fine, girls all ages. 

Time to continue cutting my topshop jeans! It gets shorter each time I try them on, & it still looks so fugly so I'm just gona cut my ass off till it looks somewhat like a decent fitting.

1. Stay put with BROWN?
2. Start anew with BLACK? OR
3. Try an even lighter brown, then after that do with black? mmmm. 

Option 3 sounds rather tempting. But do I suit black?

Yesterday was hectic. Rushing through lunch to printing and then to Lasalle. Thanks to Zora who so kindly kept up with me at my kan-chiong-self-pace. And so, I was first on the list for the interview. It was a One-on-Two presentation I didn't even know where to begin when I asked "Can I start?" So I went through all my works quite vaguely and stopping at some to show my already-made work. 

I don't even remember what I said. I only know it would be deemed as impolite to not ask questions when they asked so even though I already knew there wasn't internship, I still asked. Well, at least I got to know the exact details like how the course I'm applying has the most number of students in Lasalle that's about 400. Imagine competing in the industry? It's gona be madness.
 
Okay this was taken when we went Vivo but who cares. The angst lil girl who was ever so nice to accompany me from 4-8.30pm before she left me alone to wait on my own! Had Secret Recipe's Tea Time offer while chatting and the usually ranting.  
 
 

 
Anyway, back to Lasalle's appointment, I suppose both of us will go down to level 2 instead of going straight up to level 3. In the first place, it was deemed impossible right from the start. The point where she started saying that level 3 will be very intensive plus we are poly graduates, we would expect of hope to get directly to the degree level, but we don't really understand the system of Lasalle. For the fact that every art institution is different, I understand.  

I guess they just want us to understand how they go about doing projects for one year, get used to it then go up to level 3 when the one year intensive specialization will be put to good use. Oh well, I'll just have to wait for the letter to come in 2 weeks and wait for UniSIM's interview first, to see which I prefer. 

There's always a dilemma with the certs involved. Like which is more recognised? Which has a better teaching system? Both has their unique qualities but it's ultimately up to me. What am I to do, honestly. 
 
 



On a lighter note,  I caught KickAss with Freddy boy and his friends but with all my works and A2+ board, it was madness! Definitely recommended! Hit Girl was epic in the movie, 100% with a round of applause. Retarded Comedy with equal amount of Action wooo. Then had supper at Spize River Valley before heading home. Call ourselves lucky, we reached home just before the rain came pouring down. But it was the craziest ride ever, carrying the A2 board with such agony. The air resistance kept making me feel like I was gona fall of the bike anytime. Was so difficult to hold on to my bb, and I couldn't really see anything. 

Yeah, epic luh last night. 

 
 

Heh, & I just realised I haven't started using my bag at all & I think it'll take quite some time for me to start using it 'cus first thing first, I'm no luxury-brand kinda person. Even if so, it isn't the bags that I go for. Second thing is, as much as I like it, I somehow feel like it doesn't suit me? haha. 

Confidence to carry this, style to pull this off.  

Not like those young fugs, or lil ah lians who think that this is cheap stuff and carry it like they're some big motherfuckers just to show off? Well, they will soon understand what hard earned money is, unless they are really rich fags. Tsk.

Ha, I'm back to this emotional space.
As much as I love Singapore's bright and sunny weather, it's just too much to handle sometimes and it makes me miss Europe. The sun shining brightly yet with an ample amount of coldness, the breeze, the fast daylight and then a long night ahead. 



 
These are just a few shots that I captured in my camera till I got sick of using it 'cus I can't capture the feeling I get when I see things up close and personal but still, photos are always good. Will share those from my dad, sister & niece's cam when I've got the time.  




A typical working day at Amsterdam. Bicycles are the main mode of their transport other than cars. Imagine a car park specifically for bicycles, yes they have that. 




You can never get enough of the beautiful flowers, especially tulips in Amsterdam. The bright, rich and healthy colours can just put a smile on your face; such vibrant colours that you don't believe can grow on flowers. 






Arty Farty? You get charged for vandalism in Singapore for such graffiti unless it's for some arts event. Such graffiti in Amsterdam goes a long way, this is just a minor. Railway tracks and side alleys adds up.  


A grass person? You'll never want to leave Amsterdam for this. A coffeeshop there isn't your typical coffeeshop here in Singapore. Yeah, it's a place for heavenly weed - from space cakes, to lollipops and drinks, loose weeds, to pre rolled joints and with so many different flavours.

Funny thing is, you don't see many people in there & it's usually the older men who will visit such places. Maybe it's been so common that no one really gets hyped up about it. 


Most streets in Europe are like this. Rows and rows of beautiful victorian style buildings. They all look the same but each is significant.
 



And right now, I'm doing my portfolio. Yes, I've decided to put this in because I ain't confident of the rest of my digital work and I need to have a minimum of 10 works for the lasalle's interview tomorrow. Ah, all the memories. Coming to think about it, this is Year 1 work. Yes, that's 3 years ago. How time flies.

It's quite surprising for me to be up this early having slept at like 4.30am just now? haha. Anyway, technically I was supposed to get up at 1045 to make breakfast for bb but my results-message was the one that got me wide awake. Now bb's nagging that he's hungry and questioning if we're meeting hehe. 

Look at my results, fucking pathetic. I was so happy to see an A but at the same time wondering why are there like 3 modules when I don't remember taking so many during fyp?! Pathetic increase from 3.333 -.- 



It's like, I'm still stagnant at 3.3 unless you're telling me I can round off then it's like 3.4 lor.

I think I'll bake that later for Freddy boy & I to munch after I do some grocery shopping with Mummy! Actually was looking forward to going with Freddy boy but nevermind, everything shall be paid for haha! Ohkay this is a better combo - Freddy boy + Mummy + Supermarket together = Happy. I would love that please. 



Need to get film, and some snacks to bring over to Europe so I don't die of starvation late at night. Actually so tempted to bake some cupcakes but I am a sick bitch with a bad bad cough & flu. Pweeeees I need to get better by tomorrow so that I won't die on the 16-long-hour flight. 

    

Just wanna say that I miss ya baby boo! Will see you later, and hopefully tomorrow and then 2 weeks later!!!! 

Till then... xoxo!

Sometimes I realise that I'm too caught up with other issues that I don't even talk about my day/personal life anymore. So here's something about my day-week-month & finally with picturess!!! :] (& Nope not in chronological order)



8th March - Mummy's birthday. 
Mummy looks so cute & cartoon!!! And though I know I don't really talk much to her nowadays, I still love her. 

Gosh look at those fatty arms!!!!


18th March
I know I'm a bit of a camwhore once I start getting my hands on le camera but okay who cares. Was trying to layer my outfits but to no avail! I've decided, I shall not care what colour goes, or how retarded I'll look when I'm in Europe. Oh god, London & Paris are the two last places I would ever wanna look ugly and gross ): But nevermind, I'll label this as my own trend haha. If it isn't cold, I'd really wear just like thissss, without leggings! 








This happened last Saturday @ UniSIM
Few days ago, my friend told me he saw me on STOMP. But I din believe. Then becky was saying we looked so toot on STOMP. Then I realised it was true. Just now, my friend sent me the link and I only saw becky & zora, I was like... right that's not me. Then nvm, Zora said I had a solo picture smmre!!! This is madness. I IZ ON STOMP. haha, and thanks I know I have stalkers. haha Maybe those photographers are like geeky nerds and weird and all!!! hahaha. Okay I was just being retarded but that shot was so candid and random. I feel so........ haha stalked! I am gona be popular now. HAHAHHA.


 

15th March Monday
Speaking of my lil becky & zora lily, awwwwww. So sweet thank you Zora for the photo edits heh heh. Last day of school with my 2 loved ones! 












First day of Grad Show
Just after the grad show opening, baby and I went to catch a midnight movie. We thought Dear John was available but saw wrongly! Ended up catching "Up in the air" or something along those lines. Totally went into the cinema clueless, but the show was great :) Of course with George Clooney too? Melts! 




 
  
& Like I've always talked about how I loveeee talking/asking Freddy boy nonsense questions when he's asleep 'cus he gives funny answers, let's see what he cooked up today :p 

Me - Walks into the room after bringing the dogs down for a walk & lies beside my fast-asleep-boyfriend
Fred - Turns over and opens eyes 
Me - Hi bb! I'm back!
Fred - (Funny noises) Where you gooooo??? 
Me - I just brought the dogs down for a walk!! :) 
Fred - (Funny noises) Hurrrrrrhhhhhhhh so fasttttttt? 
Me - I went for half hour already bb!!
Fred - Hurhhhhhhh hurhhhhh why you throw the trash without meeeeeee???? (sad sounds)

PART TWO 

Me - talking/asking some random retarded questions halfway
Fred - How come you set up buffet line for me??? 
Me - Huh??? What buffet event is that?? 
Fred - Hmmm (then no reply)
Me - B where are we now??? 
Fred - Thomson 
Me - (laugh out loud to the max) What are we doing there?? Can I ride your bike??
Fred - Setting up buffet lorrrr. uh huh. 
Me - But I got no license!
Fred - Cannnnn one
Me - Then what if I get into an accident?? What if I bang the wall?? 
Fred - Then just pay for the parts.. 
Me - And then I die how? 
Fred- hmmm you won't die so fast...

HAHAHHAA I SWEAR YOU ARE DAMN CUTE B!!!!! DAMN DAMN DAMN BLOODY CUTE!!!!! Plus your cute lil puppy voice, oh my gosh I can kiss your whole face all night long!!!!! Which I kinda did so just now. hahahaha. My boyfriend is epic hilarious in his sleep I love him to bitssss!!

Cute or not my name card?! haha. Luckily I din put all of it at the grad show, I just realised that out of 100, I'm left with 30, such a heartache! So much for giving out name cards like flyers when I first got them printed ): 

Stop asking me why birds ah, I got a fetish for them and people know me as the bird-girl, that's it! haha.

All I need now is motivation, and to tell myself that this is crazy! I must buck up and be like a real mean designer, I have to charge. I have to start thinking how to do so. Oh god, I need help!!!!! For now, I will go out and enjoy myself hmph!!! Then I'll come home to think about this and do the brochure design!




Yeah it's just ongoing, it never stops, I should just take every opportunity that comes to me, Amen.

Today, I am self-accomplished. Well in a sense that I applied for UNISIM's RMIT Degree Course. Bachelor of Design - Communication Design. What's next? Lasalle? Tomorrow is a day out with the girls and Henry! It's been awhile since we've met so frequently. And Monday... It's BBDC again!

Today's meeting with the client didn't go so bad afterall, and surprisingly I felt good about it. 12 more days before I'm flying off to Europe, 11 more days to get everything done for the brochure design. Yeah, I'll try to come up with 3 digital works, let's pray hard inspiration and hweeling will be around. On a lighter note, I've finally made an accomplishment of enrolling for my driving license. 

Yes people! Manual and under School, with Madeleine! If she wasn't signing up, I think I'd still be bumming around not even picking up a skill. Now, all I have to do is set aside some time to think what I really wanna do. Study or Work? Earn money and clear all my debts and start putting lil parts of my life together. 

What a sense of satisfaction huh, to receive that! hahahaha. Yeah my journal's been boring with only words. 



 
2010 seems to be going pretty well for now. It's already March though, how fast time flies. Just when I was thinking back, I thought it was only yesterday the 1st of Jan 2010. Time to make this year fruitful, eventful and memorable. <3

What if my designs aren't good enough or do not work? I'm anticipating a back out, which will be extremely embarrassing on my part. I don't think I meet clients' wants/needs. I suck. and I suck more at Design.

My heart is beating fast, getting worried over god-knows-what, pissed to the brim, mind going cranky thinking of stuff and I have no idea where the hell are you. Can't I just get some reassurance that you are at least safe around the corner since your phone is still ringing? Rather than me, thinking, wondering, getting upset and FUCKING HELL WORRIED.

What the fuck is wrong with the fucking weather seriously? Yes it's been weeks since it's like that but today I feel totally angst. Feeling so sick of perspiring in my own bloody room and even though the fan is on. So irritated when I'm asleep and I'm perspiring too on my pillow. Where's that sense of coldness nowadays? It's night and it's still so hot. The swimming pool water's overly warmed up as well. 

Yes I'm starting to be bitchy. Now every little thing is getting on my nerves. and double dosage of anger because of the fucking pop up book that I don't feel like doing it anymore! It's that fucking particular pop up I keep doing wrong for 3 times and now I have to wait for Monday so I can reprint, I'm not gona waste a single cent on it! OKAY FUCK GO SWIMMING!!!
I haven't had the time for books for months, and in 6 days time, I'll start indulging in all my unread books, with a cup of hot tea or a nice ice cold frappe by some random cafe. Such love.

Waking up to the afternoon rays, it feels like my morning has just begun.
On repeat is a sweet chirpy song that just made my day unexpectedly. 

Time to start my life back on track, time to enjoy work and play.

On me dit que nos vies ne valent pas grand chose,
People tell me that our lives are not worth much
Elles passent en un instant comme fnent les roses.
They pass in one short moment just like roses do
On me dit que le temps qui glisse est un salaud que de nos chagrins
People tell me that time which slips away is a bastard, that with our sorrows
Il s'en fait des manteaux pourtant quelqu'un m'a dit...

He makes coats for Him. Yet someone told me
Refrain (chorus)
Que tu m'aimais encore,
That you still loved me
C'est quelqu'un qui m'a dit que tu m'aimais encore.
It's someone who told me, that you still loved me.
Serais ce possible alors ?
Would it be possible then?
On me dit que le destin se moque bien de nous
People tell me that destiny makes fun of us
Qu'il ne nous donne rien et qu'il nous prome

That it doesn't give anything to us and promise for everything
Parat qu'le bonheur est porte de main,
I heard that we could easily reach happiness
Alors on tend la main et on se retrouve fou
So we raise our hand to catch it and become crazy
Pourtant quelqu'un m'a dit ...
Yet someone told me....

Refrain (chorus)
Mais qui est ce qui m'a dit que toujours tu m'aimais?
But who told me that you still loved me?
Je ne me souviens plus c'tait tard dans la nuit,
I don't remember, it was late at night
J'entend encore la voix, mais je ne vois plus les traits
I still hear the voice, but I can't see the face anymore
"Il vous aime, c'est secret, lui dites pas que j'vous l'ai dit"
"He loves you, that's  a secret, don't tell him I told you"
Tu vois quelqu'un m'a dit...
You see someone told me
Que tu m'aimais encore, me l'a t'on vraiment dit...
that you still loved me, was I really told that...
Que tu m'aimais encore, serait-ce possible alors ?
That you still loved me, would it be possible then?

By the time I clear all my debts and graduation show, I'd be left with nothing. I can set aside shopping but when the opportunity for diving comes, how can I miss it right? It's been 7 years since I've told myself to go for diving course. $500+ how am I able to afford it on my own? 

Hey Valentine, you'll be my valentine 365 days round the clock, not just one day of the year. Sometimes I really wonder how would my one-year-ago be like without you. If I haven't started talking to you (like as if I've been talking to you the past 12 years of knowing you), if I haven't hung out with you, if I haven't went with the flow, if I haven't got along with my gut feeling, where would we be standing now? You in your own world filled with hott babes and hang outs with your boys? Will you be bumming life away? Will you be sleeping when your whole family is out and awake when they're all asleep? Would I always be at your house hanging out with Geraldine but never seeing you there at all? 

Love, why are you so special? I just don't understand why some girls can go crazy and scream at the top of their lungs at the ones the love so much. But me? No matter how angry I am, I can't do it, I can never bring myself to do it. Thanks for taking care of me even when I was such a mess, for staying up with me when I was drunk even though you had a rough day and the next day of work was gona be even more hectic. For all the sweet nothings, hugs and kisses, words of wisdom and uncountable 'I love you'(s), well, I love you too and I hope you can feel it.  

Hello I know I'm full of praises for you. That doesn't mean you get all the credits too okay! haha. <3 
Now the question is, how long can we go? I wish either one of us already had the answer.

Hello portfolio, I've gotta start kickin' and get it done! Yes, I know I always say that I've got no zest to do all these shit, plus ever since P5 was over, who had the mood to do anything else other than bumming around right. This - is my only accomplishment of the day. 

Nope, I din accomplish waking up at 8 for school. Anyway I know I wouldn't do much when I'm in school so what's the point :]

 

 
Now now, doesn't it look like me? I left out so much details but yeah, sick of details haha. Needa chill before I start redoing my activity kit for the previous project. Then move on to choosing works for my portfolio. Le sigh. So many things to do, so little time AGAIN.
Good bye lazy Sundays, and Hello Monday Blues.

Recently, I've been saying how I've lost touch with Town. Today, still after ages of not going to town, I still feel so lost that it seems so foreign to me. Ah, that's good in a way, I feel like I'm in a new city. hoohoo. 

And finally I've bought something I need not want! Yes, a new bra from women secret, a bit too cute already - Green polka dots with Oswald the Lucky Rabbit cartoon! But whatever, just very satisfied with a new bra after 89271438 months of the same few bras. haha. 



 
And here's another preview of my name card progress. Seriously I think nobody should ask me why birds. And why "chipmunk chickens" like what Shaun told me. I have no idea, I just like it so.... haha. Fuck it! My name card should be done the way I want it look and what designs I want on it right? Hehehehehe, I'd rather do stuff for myself rather than P5 and Portfolio. ugh.

Creating my own name card now, and the best way to represent myself? All I keep thinking about are those lil bird cartoons I did before, for the flea market. mmm shall I carry on using it? 

First of all, is it me-me-me? Like you'd think this is soooo Cheryl? 
(Totally Incomplete, still testing out the colours and imagery :] )
Listening to "I told you so" by Carrie Underwood gives me the emotional vibes. Time to say goodbye to another phase of life.
I suddenly miss the song "More Than Words", and so, I'm gona do a cover in a bit hahahahaha. Shy me.

I realised all I had posted were self-indulgent talks, I forgot to wish everyone a very Happy Chinese New Year! Yeah, happy? You can tell how bored I am at home, only did visiting on the first day that's it. Okay, I'll just be me and start cleaning my room again.

Call me selfish, all I wanna do is spend some alone time with you. Entre-Nous Creperie is the place I wanna bring you for dessert, my treat. just hope that you'll finally be free by then. And hopefully it's you on your own. 

Yes I'm selfish and I'm gona exclaim it out loud that I AM SELFISH WHEN I HAVE TO BE. Because I don't see you ever-so-often anymore, because everytime I see you, you're dead tired from work, you're half asleep, you're 95% lying on your bed & you have no time for us anymore.

It's because we don't celebrate monthly that's why I'd look forward to Valentines' Day even more though I don't really see a point of any celebration. But apparently this year's different, this relationship's different. I just want to be pampered for a day.

This is what happens when you are rushing to get everything done, and there's so much on your mind -
"Dont think, just take, just buy."

And there you have it, my first largest UHU Glue purchase ever.

I din realise how long my hair has grown, and look! I need to do something to my hair, give it a nice colour cus all my roots are showing already and a nice trim so the ends won't look so terrible. 

Can someone tell me if I did lose weight? I know I don't see any difference but it's like I can fit into my black high waist pants so comfortably now, and my shorts are all getting so loose. It's a damn good thing that I'm slimming down but the thought of not fitting into all my clothes nicely sucks too. Ugh, especially those leggings that are already slightly loose! Mummy also said my face smaller!! haha so funny the way she said it. 


 

Camwhorez queen. I'm sure I don't camwhore as much as some other people but, I just like to upload!


 
Okay enough, I need to spare some time for myself to whine about how much I want these 2 pair of shoes! New balance one is the shizzle!!! I soooooooo want it, & I think it's $126. Anyone wanna be my lover and buy for me a pair??? I soooooo want it before there's no more!!!! Anyway both pairs look soooo much better when you're at the shop itself. OKAY BY HOOK OR BY CROOK I'M GOING TO BUY. 

WEDNESDAY THURSDAY WHENEVER I FIND MONEY. I need shopping therapy, I need to get back my eating habits!!!

Today, in quite a long time, I'm feeling the self emotional vibes. Of being so helpless just by my own body language and actions, I feel like I'm physically around but my soul is somewhere out there or it just died on me. 




Ever felt like someone's actions and words just don't tally? And slowly, you end up not putting any trust in him/her then you get into arguments and finally a break up. It's sad how people only see it from one point of view. So what if you feel that their actions and words don't tally, do you give them a chance to speak up and tell you from their perspective? Yes, no?

I always feel that everything works both ways. In any case, both parties should have equal rights in speaking up and saying how they feel before it leads into a very abrupt ending. 



And then you have people who trust this sentence, "Seeing is believing". I am one who believes in such a statement. But there are some who just believe in hear-say. Thing is, people are just so complex. Everyone says they want a simple life, that simplicity is bliss and look at what's happening to all of us? We are defeated by gossips and bitchings. 

Then again, of course when you don't see what you're meant to, it'll be that way forever, you'll be kept in the dark without knowing anything. And till the day you found that it's been going on for quite awhile, you break down, you turn all sour, you never want to believe in just "seeing is believing", you never want to trust anyone anymore because you placed all your faith, hope and trust in that one person. And for that one person to break it in just a split second.... what makes you think it'll be so easy to pick it up again? 

It's easy to tear things/people apart, but it's difficult to pick up the pieces and fix them back together. 


Well, nuff saying how i feel. Just felt rather hearty today, to the extent that I feel like tearing. Heartfelt moments from so many people this weekend up till today. Freddy boy, Mummy & Miss Tan. And to think that I would be fine on my own doing things at my own risk. It's always the case that her messages never fail to make me feel so guilty and helpless, like I feel I've disappointed her time and again this semester. Well, I've learnt something from her today via sms "as long as you learn from the process, we are here to guide and give you moral support. :) Smile" It's these kinda messages that always leave me speechless, I have no idea how to reply, & to begin with, I have no idea what to even say.

I am going to hijack Vans or New Balance @ Left Foot this Wednesday/Thursday!!! I found the loveliest shoes... One of which has been there for ages, I should get it! But.... mmmm New Balance is very.... mmmmm enticing!

I hate it when all I do is blog about school and being stressed out, where's that sense of fun in my life anymore? Haha, but whatever today shall be the day I talk happy things. Today is the day I talk about how I haven't touched work at all for 2 days straight. 

And the last thing I wanna mention about is schoolwork, just have to do so ): 
I'm left with.....

1) Packaging Graphics
2) Brochure FC|BC & make! 
3) Cut A2 boards for A3 posters 
4) Measurement for folder Make!
5) Brand story sheet? 
6) Other banner designs
7) Super imposing everything!!!
8) Brand Guidelines
9) Specs 

Oh why, helloooooo Wednesday I will prepare to die. 

Back to - Saturday was baby's surprise birthday celebration and Sunday was dinner! Can you imagine how difficult it was to plan out everything? Luckily it went smoothly in the most impromptu way. For one, I'm a planner and when things happen and you have to think of solutions on the spot, I panic and have no idea what to do. So Saturday night was a killer. 

The plan we had in mind was kinda ruined by soccer match which of course Freddy boy will definitely catch when there's ManU around. So let's just keep it simple and say that he got damn pissed with me for making him go downstairs for his surprise. I mean yeah it's so stupid to force the birthday boy to go all the way down just to be wished by our condo boys at the clubhouse right? Felt so helpless seeing him so pissed, and in my heart I was like "I'm innocent, I don't wanna make you angry but I have no choice. If you're not gona move your ass I'm just gona have to throw a bitch fit and act up some tantrums" to a point where I really felt like crying 'cus I had no idea if he would be fine after that. 

But all was good when he saw a long line of people walking in with a birthday cake, say 23 over people? 2am we cleared the clubhouse cus of the fucking guard with a fucking fucked up attitude. heh. Left for railmall to chillz and poker till 7.30am? By then of course most of them left. 

By the time I was home, tried doing work but I ended up half asleep to the extent where I wrote nonsense on my "to-do list". 
"Cut A2 mounting boards + help to mouth damn long". after writing that, I was subconsciously thinking what is mouth damn long? Then I realised and I was like wtf. That woke me up haha!! Then... when i was trying to sleep, Mummy said she already made Cereal for meeeee, so I had to stay up smmre!!! Till like 10am? Haven't been eating well... 

Baby came over for awhile to play wii when we both woke up, then I changed and headed over to his place! Check out the birthday boy carrying and wearing his birthday gifts! haha, that's like full-body birthday present except the belt which I got from bangkok and his 'new' jeans that he bought from Lim Hao. 


Haha Baby asked me to wear shoes. I so want and need a pair of vans soon!!!!

Vroom vroooommmm to True Blue Peranakan for dinner, hoohoo first time I made a reservation!

Going away from this space for a bit.

13 days and counting to the day when we'll all be free from extreme stress and lack of sleep. Important products haven't been done, haven't been conceptualised, haven't been sketched out. Each time I think of giving up, I start to think of the years I've gone through such hectic days, with more than 2 projects at hand so why can't I handle just one major project? 

13 days left cannot be compared to the amount of effort I've put in the past 2-3 years, that's prolly 730 days. I cannot let fatigue weigh me down, not one bit. I used to be able to go on for 48 hours without sleeping, I'm sure I can do it again but now, I'm struggling so bad. Why is it that headache has to always affect me? Wake up. Run. Do work. Just, do not sleep. 

Or maybe I should just sleep. ugh.

my horoscope is getting more and more true each day, yeah getting scary. 


Today's emphasis is on decision making, Libra, but the decisions you make today are concerned with your future, not with what to have for dinner. Although you could be involved in meetings and discussions, you still focus on questions about whether or not you are doing what makes you happy. Sitting down and making up pro and con lists about your plans, would be a favorable thing to do, as would talking things over with a trustworthy, and possibly objective, friend. Don't waste time arguing over inconsequential things today; gossip and rumor should be ignored as well.
